alert.note: Alert for Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:46PM MST until December 25 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition, some light rain may fall Saturday evening in the mountains. While air temperatures may be above freezing, rain may still freeze on contact with the frozen ground.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
